# Planning Division

__

#### Department of Planning and Development Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Our offices are open 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday. 

__

703-324-1380 TTY 711

__

Email Us

__

12055 Government Center Parkway, Suite 730  
Fairfax, VA 22035

__

Kelly Atkinson  
Director

# 2022-2023 Countywide SSPA Process - Community Meeting Archive 

The 2022-2023 SSPA nominations that were accepted by the Board were reviewed by staff, and a series of community meetings were held to ensure those living and working near the nominated sites knew about the proposed changes and had the opportunity to provide early comments. The community meetings took place between January 2023 - February 2023.

Nominations in the northern Richmond Highway corridor and Baileys Crossroads/Seven Corners areas were reviewed in in-person meetings. Nominations elsewhere in the county were reviewed in a series of virtual meetings. Community meeting information and details are available below, sorted by meeting date. Video recordings of the virtual meetings are posted under the respective community meetings. 

The SSPA community meeting summaries are also available for review. 

* * *

**Richmond Hwy**  
Tuesday, January 10, 2023 at 7:00 p.m.  
In-Person Meeting  
Whitman Middle School Cafeteria  
2500 Parkers Lane, Alexandria, VA, 22306

  * MV-001 - Nomination | One Page Staff Summary

  * MV-007 - Nomination | One Page Staff Summary
